import React from 'react' export default function Rating(props) { const { rating, numReviews } = props; return (
= 1? "fa fa-star" : rating >=0.5? 'fa fa-star-half-o' :'fa fa-star-o'}/> = 2? "fa fa-star" : rating >=1.5? 'fa fa-star-half-o' : 'fa fa-star-o'} /> = 3? "fa fa-star" : rating >=2.5? 'fa fa-star-half-o' : 'fa fa-star-o'} /> = 4? "fa fa-star" : rating >=3.5? 'fa fa-star-half-o' : 'fa fa-star-o'} /> = 5? "fa fa-star" : rating >=4.5? 'fa fa-star-half-o' : 'fa fa-star-o'} /> { numReviews+ ''}
) }
